definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

pinyin: mi4 bi4 shi4 xun2 huan2 zai4 hu1 xi1 shui3 fei4 xi4 tong3
containing_words.word: 密閉式循環再呼吸水肺系統

sentences.english: Unless your scuba diving equipment is up to standard, do not use it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的水肺潛泳設備不合標準，就不要使用它。

sentences.english: I'm planning to get a scuba diving licence.
sentences.chinese: 我計劃去考取一個佩帶水肺潛水的證書。

sentences.english: While on honeymoon in Bali, she learned to scuba dive.
sentences.chinese: 巴厘島度蜜月時學會了帶水肺潛水。

sentences.english: We had to put on a wetsuit to go scuba diving.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須穿上保溫潛水服才能進行水肺潛水。

sentences.english: For water sports, scuba-diving and snorkeling courses are available.
sentences.chinese: 其水上運動包括水肺潛水和浮潛課程可供選擇。

sentences.english: Last night I had a bizarre dream. I went scuba diving with Aaron in the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我做了個怪夢，夢到我和艾倫在海里玩水肺潛水。

sentences.english: Trips range from a simple one-day taste of the reef to full-blown scuba diving certificationexcursions.
sentences.chinese: 可以戴上水肺在海底進行一天的潛水探險。

sentences.english: The surface configuration of pulmonary adenocarcinoma cells in the malignant pleural effusion of 15 patients was investigated with SEM.
sentences.chinese: 用掃描電鏡觀察15例胸水肺腺癌細胞表面超微結構。

sentences.english: Visitors can also try their hand at deep-sea fishing, scuba diving or Sea-Doo rentals.
sentences.chinese: 參觀者還可以租借水肺嘗試到深海捕魚。

definition: to dive/to go under water/(in an online forum) to lurk
ventilator (artificial breathing apparatus used in hospitals)

pinyin: fu2 li4 tiao2 zheng3 zhuang1 zhi4
